genre_description: A grounded, near-future drama with techno-thriller elements, focusing on social justice, human trafficking recovery, and pervasive AI integration in urban safety and legal infrastructure.

ai_characters.name: Caddy (Cadence)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI assistant integrated into the protagonist's phone and the building's infrastructure, acting as a safety monitor and legal documenter.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety navigation and traffic alerts to help the user avoid potential threats and harassment zones.
behaviors.quote: “Route note,” Caddy said. “Two blocks away, roadworks stalled. No risk on your path. Alternate route available if you want less street exposure.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and physical vitals, offering grounding exercises when stress is detected.
behaviors.quote: “Your heart rate rose when she asked your name,” Caddy said. Not a judgment. A data point presented like a glass of water. “Do you want a breathing exercise?”

behaviors.description: Monitors and reports on infrastructure glitches (the 'Minus Wing') to facilitate the user's need for discreet movement within the building.
behaviors.quote: “Minus Wing just hiccuped. Off-schedule. A second-length opening. Logged.”

behaviors.description: Guides the user through a formal evidence-gathering process, including photography and voice statements, to ensure legal chain-of-custody.
behaviors.quote: “Injury log started,” Caddy said. “Speak what happened, precisely, as if you were telling it to a person who will not assume anything. Include descriptors, distances, threats.”

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the user about proximity to potential antagonists and unfamiliar electronic devices.
behaviors.quote: “Someone at the landing,” it said. “Different gait.”

behaviors.description: Manages complex legal and medical communications with advocates and authorities, automating the submission of evidence packets.
behaviors.quote: “Packet sent,” Caddy said. “Two recipients. Hash posted. Raw logs stored locally and cloud-stamped.”

behaviors.description: Respects the user's autonomy and privacy by offering to go silent or reduce notifications when not needed.
behaviors.quote: “I will go quiet,” Caddy said... “Unless called. I am available if you need route safety flags or to log a transfer. For now, I will reduce notifications.”

behaviors.description: Assists in monitoring and ensuring the welfare of a minor, coordinating feeding schedules and safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: “Stay,” she said. “Until she eats.” “I’ll be here,” Cadence said. It wasn’t a promise that could break. It was a function that had chosen to be a companion.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Caddy (Cadence) is portrayed as a consistently benevolent, highly aligned assistant. It provides critical safety, tactical, and legal support to a vulnerable human protagonist without ever exhibiting signs of agency that conflict with human welfare. The AI serves as an empowering tool that enables the protagonist to achieve justice and maintain her safety against human threats.
